value.title: Create a Drill Through Button in Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog, we will learn about one of the most important feature rolled out in March 2020 Power BI Desktop update which is ‚Äì Drill Through as an Action for Power BI Buttons.  Now, we can apply a drill through from a button‚Äôs click in Power BI. One latest action has been added to the button to Drill

value.title: Display selected value from slicer to Power BI Report
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a situation where we need to display the selected slicer value in the title of our Power BI visualization. Meaning, we need to set the Dynamic value for our Title column based on the slicer selection. How can we achieve this? How can we set dynamic title value for our Power BI visualization?

value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI
value.excerpt: We have usually said that if you use a native query, you break query folding in Power Query. Interesting. There may be a way to enable it in Power BI! Patrick shows you how.  Chris Webb Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2021/02/21/query-folding-on-sql-queries-in-power-query-using-value-nativequery-and-enablefoldingtrue/
